channel.title: Finding my SQL SERVER?
channel.description:
Well, im using xampp and ive decided to try to set up some basic Sql stuff.
I currently have it working on Localhost, but to add to forums etc i need to open port 3306 > Done, and my SQL server is the ip it says,
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2008, 05:26:33 AM[/size][hr]m
